language.set_success: ✅ You have successfully set the language for this server to '{{selectedLanguage}}'

history.not_valid_steamid: ❌ Invalid Steam ID. Please provide either SteamID, SteamID3, or SteamID64.

match.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch match details. The match ID might be invalid or the server is down.

store.success: You have successfully linked your Steam account: {{name}} ({{id}})

warnings.cooldown: ❌ Please wait another `{{time}}` seconds to run this command!
warnings.no_permission: ❌ You don't have permission to use this command!
warnings.no_command: ❌ Command not found. Please check the command name!

errors.generic_error: ❌ Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.steam_not_yet_stored: ❌ You have not yet connected your Steam account. Please use: '/store' first!
errors.steam_player_not_found: ❌ Player not found. Try using SteamID instead!
errors.get_steam_id_type_failed: ❌ Could not detemine steam id type

close_thread.not_creator: ❌ Only the player who started this lobby can close the thread.
close_thread.archive_failed: ❌ Couldn't archive this channel. Is it a thread?
close_thread.error_generic: ❌ Something went wrong while closing the thread.

finish_match.no_party_id: ❌ Couldn't find an active lobby for this match.
finish_match.error_generic: ❌ Something went wrong while processing the match. Please try again.

join_party.invalid_id: ❌ Internal error. Please try again later.
join_party.lobby_not_found: ❌ This lobby no longer exists or has expired.
join_party.already_joined: ⚠️ You're already part of this lobby.
join_party.error_generic: ❌ Couldn't join the lobby. Please try again later.

pagination.session_invalid: ❌ This pagination session is no longer valid or doesn't belong to you.
pagination.error_generic: ❌ Couldn't load this page. Please try again later.
